product_name: SunCloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Light as a butterfly and featuring a Lavender Print frame, the women's Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses bring summery style to all your outdoor exploits. Polarized polycarbonate injection-molded lenses cut glare and offer 100% protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Gray lenses block 85% of visible light, great for super-sunny days. Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses feature lightweight yet durable Grilamid frames and custom metal logo plaques.
short_description: Light as a butterfly and featuring a Lavender Print frame, the women's Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses bring summery style to all your outdoor exploits.
